view

Class SellerUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.SellerUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddScreen, DeleteScreen, UpdateScreen

    public class SellerUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Joey The SellerUI class is a class that is used as a template for the different screens that the seller can use to add, delete, or update. This is use of the Strategy Pattern.
